snippet: More marketers, including San Antonio’s Convention and Visitors Bureau, are trying to capitalize on consumer interest in Valentine’s Day.
lead_paragraph: More marketers, including San Antonio’s Convention and Visitors Bureau, are trying to capitalize on consumer interest in Valentine’s Day.

headline.seo: You’ve Got to Have Heart, San Antonio Says
